chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para:
The users of Risk Analyzer are supply chain managers who in the course of their work need to view and manage information regarding the network of suppliers for their company. The application supports the following use cases:
View the supply chain, i.e. network of suppliers and the target company
View information pertaining to a supplier
View information pertaining to a target company
Update information pertaining to a supplier
Update information pertaining to a target company
Add a new supplier to the supply chain
Add a new target company to the supply chain
Delete an existing supplier
Delete an existing target company
Export the supply chain to XML
Import the supply chain from XML
View frequency distribution* analysis performed on the supply chain
